sentence: Gonzalez, who announced his decision in November, was facing a primary challenge from Trump-backed Republican Max Miller.
author: Daniel Marans
title: Third Republican Who Voted To Impeach Trump Now Retiring

sentence: He made his first endorsement of a primary challenger to one of the 10 GOP House members who crossed him on impeachment — former and favored aide Max Miller against incumbent Anthony Gonzalez (R-Ohio).

And some of Trump's chosen candidates were there as well - including Max Miller of Ohio, who is vying to replace the retiring GOP Rep. Anthony Gonzalez, an impeachment backer, and Kelly Tshibaka, taking on Republican Sen. Lisa Murkowski, who said Trump should be convicted for inciting an insurrection.

title: 'What the hell is going on?' Donald Trump demands an audit of Mark Zuckerberg's $417m election donations as he reheats claim of 2020 fraud in CPAC address

sentence: EXCLUSIVE: ORLANDO, Fla.—Ohio GOP congressional candidate and former Trump administration official Max Miller said Russian President Vladimir Putin saw "weak leadership" from President Biden ahead of launching a multi-front war in Ukraine, which he said emboldened him to invade.

sentence: +6 View gallery Rep. Bob Gibbs, a pro-Trump Republican, has represented Ohio's 7th Congressional District since 2013 and has served in Congress since 2011 +6 View gallery Last month a newly-redrawn version of Ohio's district map made ex-Trump staffer Max Miller, who had been challenging anti-Trump Republican Rep. Anthony Gonzalez in the May 3 primary, switch to Gibbs' territory He thanked his supporters as well as family and friends, stating he was 'eternally grateful' for his time at the US Capitol.

title: Republican Rep. Bob Gibbs announces he will RETIRE before the midterms and clears the way for Stephanie Grisham's Trump-backed ex-boyfriend to win the GOP primary
